messages.subject: CP: Northeast Unschooling Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hi folks! This is an announcement for the preliminary website for the Northeast Unschooling Conference, taking place in Peabody, Massachusetts (north of
messages.messageBody:
Hi folks!
This is an announcement for the preliminary website for the Northeast
Unschooling Conference, taking place in Peabody, Massachusetts (north of Boston)
Memorial Day Weekend, May 22-24, 2008.

Please excuse the appearance of the website right now -- it's atrocious! --
but I wanted to get some information out right away. The new site is going to
be prettier and more informative. Go to
_http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/_ (http://northeastunschoolingconference.com/)

Also, for more updates, join the conference list at
_NEUConference-subscribe@yahoogroups.com_ (mailto:NEUConference-subscribe@yahoogroups.com)

Kathryn Baptista



************************************** See what's new at http://www.aol.com


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
